features: 【Great Gift for kids】:Topelotek tablet for kids with kid Mode, the Child-Friendly Interface makes it easy to use. Topelotek Tablet for toddlers offers access to a range of age-appropriate and up-to-date fun content including games, videos, paintings, and educational apps. In their key stage of developing abilities of the brain, children can see, listen, feel and observe the world through the tablet. Supporting 38 languages, including Spanish, every kid can play on it.

【Powerful & Multiple Function】:Topelotek Kids tablets is equipped with the latest Android 10.0 Operating System, dual cameras, 2GB RAM, 32GB Flash, 1.5G Hz quad-core processor, which runs simultaneously, delivering quick app launches, smooth games, and videos. Supports Micro SD card up to 64GB for more space to store photos, music, movies, and videos. GMS certified can let your kids use Google App more smoothly and safely.

【Advanced Parental Control】:With parental control mode, you can create and customize profiles for kids’ accounts on this Topelotek kids tablet, hand-pick content for your kids, control screen time, and ensure they are browsing safe websites. These security settings can be adjusted as kids grow with content tailored to their age.

【Exclusive Kid-Proof Case】:The specially designed case protects your kid's tablet against dust, bumps, and drops. At the same time, all the features are accessible with precise cut-outs of ports, cameras. A colorful and Stable stand on the back of the case allows toddlers to go hands-free for watching videos and video chatting.

【12 Months protection Service】:We put customer satisfaction on the first standard. If there is any problem with the use of kids learning tablet, please feel free to contact us via Amazon. We have perfect service and you will get a satisfactory answer. We provide 30-days money-back and 12 months of worry-free protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TOPELOTEK KIDS707 Kids Tablet —— A full-feature tablet for toddler kids

Age-appropriate Content for Kids Love TOPELOTEK kids tablet enhanced high-performance quad-core processor with 2GB RAM and 32GB ROM (expandable to 128GB) storage space, offering access to thousands of ad-free books, movies, shows, music stations, apps, and games. Kids can access their favorite subscription across Android 10 OS.

Easy to Use Parental Controls Use parental control mode to limit screen time, set educational goals and filter content by customizing profiles for each kids’ accounts, the change of content restriction/time addition requires the input of the password set by parents, so child can not be easily removed.

Enjoy Parent-Child Fragrant Time This tablet is not only for kids but also for your family to have Parent-Child happy time together. Learning by playing is the best way for children to understand the world around them. TOPELOTEK KIDS707 children tablet comes with many apps of Montessori, stored videos, music and different educational games and more, satisifed all your kids needs.

Keeps your kids away from myopia The kids learning tablet equips with 1024*600 HD eye protection touch screen which is designed to protect your child's eyes. With the property of anti-reflective and blue light, this toddler tablet is perfect for kids to prolonged use without fatiguing eye oils or causing fatigue.
Previous page Next page 1 Kids Tablet Specification 2 Removable Case & Handle 3 Great Gift Choice 4 Available On-the-go! 5 Enjoy Learning by Playing

Kids Learning Tablet for Toddlers TOPELOTEK Toddler tablet for kids is designed with kids in mind, with 2GB RAM, 32GB ROM as well as the possibility to expand the storage space with a 128GB TF card, this 7-inch android tablet offers enough storage space for all your child's favorite games, videos, music and Apps. The toddler tablet comes with GMS certified system and parental control software, free pre-installed apps with kid-friendly content to let your child learning by playing and increase their creativity and imagination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the cost. Customer service was very helpful as well.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the blue and rose colored tablets for our toddlers. For the price, the tablets are good and give a controlled experience. We had an unfortunate problem with one of the tablets but customer service offered warranty solution easily. Would recommend the tablets for younger kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves his tablet. He has autism and this tablet is easy for him to use. The case is just what he needed to keep the tablet safe. We had a few questions and they responded promptly over email and helped us out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money!!!
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t recommend this tablet. I originally got it for my 2 year old for Christmas and it was broken within 2 weeks. Didn’t stay charged long, had to press on it pretty had to get things to work. I had to reset it a few times before it finally died on us. I figured my toddler broke it because he is pretty rough.Bought another one a couple months ago and thought everything was good until one day it stopped connecting to the internet and soon after my toddler brings his tablet to me with a picture of the android guy laying down and I couldn’t figure how to fix it. I reset it AGAIN and it worked for an hour before the dead android guy was back. I gave up on this thing and will suck it up and spend more money on a better tablet that will last longer than a month.DONT BELIEVE EVERY GOOD REVIEW, I bought this thing twice. It’s trash!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid love for the price it’s worth it
reviews.reviewText: My kid love for the price it’s worTh it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's pretty good.
reviews.reviewText: Only downside is the battery does not last long at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The power button no longer works.
reviews.reviewText: The tablet is not even a year old yet and the power button no longer works. The battery life is not that great and the tablet is slow. It worked great for the first week or so. Now my daughter is unable to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waste of Money/Seller Issues
reviews.reviewText: I bought this tablet for my four year old in February and was initially impressed with the quality. The battery life was great. The speed was even great. About a month in, the handle on the case broke off while she was carrying it. Now it’s July and the tablet is totally broken. I reached out to the seller in June when the screen started becoming unresponsive. It started out freezing and then there would be spots of the screen that wouldn’t respond to touch. We would have to rotate the tablet several times to get it to work. I was asked to upload a video to the seller’s customer service email address. A couple days later, I didn’t get a response so I reached out to the seller, to which, they replied that they had received my video and would reach out to me soon with the best resolution this was on 6/12/22. It is now 7/6/22 and I’ve reached out to them several times with no response.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loved this the selection on books is great

The media could not be loaded. Compre dos y hasta ahora no he tenido problemas con ella, la pila dura alrededor de 4 horas perp tmb depende de las app q se esten usando tenemos alrededor de mes y medio con ellas y ademas trae una app de juegos educativos q se acomodan a la edad del niño o niña
Reacciona muy lento, todas las funciones ….
La tablet en general está bien tomando en cuenta la marca y el precio, pero la pila dura muy poco.
